name: Survivors of Xcalibur
summary: Survivors of Xcalibur introduces a bold, new perspective to the bullet-heaven and survivor-like genres by harnessing the power of Virtual Reality. Inspired by genre-defining games like Vampire Survivors and Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor, this game delivers an unmatched sense of presence and agency. In VR, every battle becomes a visceral, physical challenge, allowing players to guide their knight like a fully poseable action figure, delivering deadly moves with precision and style.
